name: The lazy child
description:
A simple game about a strict mom and a lazy child.

All you have to do is to observe observe the scattered objects and understand how much (and if) the child has tidied up the room. 

At the end, make your choice: LEFT CLICK to select, and RIGHT CLICK to deselect.

Enjoy!

INFO:

It's our first jam ever! It was a lot of fun, but not easy.

The game is made with the Godot engine.

The last rule is the old one, the one with the "500 lines limit"
